content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) / [@mix.exe](@DIoOBMaI1f0mJg+5tUzZ7vgzCeeHh8+zGta4pOjc+k0=.ed25519) 

Thanks! Are you having problems loading new images as well? Old images may be cached but there's [an issue where ssb-ws is binding to the wrong IP](https://github.com/ssbc/patchwork/issues/1024) and I'm curious if that's the same as your broken emoji bug. I think this might be caused by [non-private-ip](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-config/blob/master/defaults.js#L4) from ssb-config, it looks like that was added [way back when](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-config/blob/b7d1037ff51c756ccbad182795b65a60614ecb6d/index.js) and might be worth removing now?
